competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Dominant code hosting platform, particularly for open source

competitors.name: Travis CI
competitors.notes: Hosted CI service popular with open source projects

context: In 2015, GitLab was an early-stage startup positioning against GitHub with open-source self-hosted option. GitHub dominated code hosting while GitLab differentiated with integrated CI/CD and self-hosted deployment option. The DevOps movement was accelerating CI/CD adoption. GitLab received Series A funding and began building its all-in-one DevOps platform vision. Competition focused on repository hosting, with CI/CD tools as separate products.
